review: Everything you could possibly want in a compact package. I took advantage of the Prime members presale and picked one up for $19.  Worth it at twice the price!I had a Roku box, and had entertained the idea of ordering a Google Chromecast or Roku Stick.  When I saw the Fire Stick, based on my previous experiences with Amazon products,I knew it was what I needed.  I cut the cord on Cable several months back.  Around May of 2014.  The Fire Stick lets me stream a ton of content and doesn't need a space to sit like the boxes that do the same.  I like the interface.  And the variety of channels and apps is great.As a bonus, if you have a smartphone, there is an app that can be used as a controller.  It helps when you are searching to be able to use a keyboard on your phone instead of the text entry on the remote.I also noticed that on my new Kindle Fire 6, that you can put content from the Kindle on your TV through the stick.  I'm sure there is some sort of remote function as well, but I haven't researched it.
author: rda
